H0.text: A harquebus/arquebus is an early form of. Crossbow

H1.text: A harquebus/arquebus is an early form of. Cannon

H2.text: A harquebus/arquebus is an early form of. Pistol

H3.text: A harquebus/arquebus is an early form of. Gun

A4.text: The musket, essentially a large arquebus, was introduced around 1521

A5.text: The matchlock arquebus is considered the forerunner to the flintlock musket
